Rates

Summary of charges for homeowners: see below for details
Weekdays1st 30 minutes (in the St Austell area only)£15
Per hour£23 (1st hour) and £20 (2nd hour etc.)
Per half day £70
Per day£120
SaturdaysPer hour£25
Out of hoursPer hour£30

For all handyman jobs carried out in private dwellings for the householder during normal working hours (9am-6:30pm, Mondays to Fridays), the first 30 minutes costs £15 or the first hour costs £23. After that, we charge decreasing rates per hour as shown below: a whole day works out at £15/hour. These terms are for cash/cheque payment on completion; if you wish to be invoiced, you will be charged at the commercial rate of £25/hour. All materials and fixings supplied are charged at cost.

Hourly rates (per person attending)
Hours Cost
½ hour in St Austell £15
1 £23
2 £43
3 £62
4 £70
5 £83
6 £99
7 £114
8 £120
Saturday £25 per hour
Evenings £30 per hour
Commercial from £25 per hour

We reserve the right to specify a minimum 1 hour appointment for visits outside the St Austell area, unless these can be combined with another job in the same area.

Saturday appointments for working people

We realise that not everyone can manage to take time off work for appointments. So, we offer Saturday daytime appointments, with a minimum charge of £25, and a cost of £12.50 per 30 minutes thereafter.

Out of hours calls

If you need something done outside normal hours (bank holidays, Sundays and evenings), we'll do our best to help, but all calls are subject to a minimum charge of £30 for up to an hour, then £15 per 30 minutes thereafter.

Cancellations / missed appointments

Please cancel an unwanted appointment as soon as you know you will not be able to keep it, and make sure you are in when we arrive for a booked appointment. Otherwise, we waste time and money travelling to your home or property, and let other people down unnecessarily.

Painting and Decorating

Budget Refresh Painting Jobs, Changing Worktops, Construct and re-position Partition Walls, Filling in Cracks and Holes in Plaster or Woodwork, Fit Kitchens and Bathrooms, Fit Suspended Ceilings, Install and Upgrade Bathroom and Kitchen Facilities, Interior and Exterior Painting, Outside Painting Work, Painting a Fence, Doors and Windows, Putting up Shelves and Doors, Re-seal Bathrooms and Kitchens, Repairing and Removing Damaged Grout, Repairs to Plaster and Plasterboard, Sealing Baths and Sinks, Touching up Paintwork, Wallpapering, Woodwork Painting

Carpentry

Assembling Flat Pack Furniture, Building Small Cupboards and Shelves, Changing Door Locks, Door and Window Frame Repairs, Door Hanging or Adjusting, Draught Proofing Doors and Windows, Easing Jammed Doors and Windows, Fence and Gate Repairs, Hanging New Doors, Hanging Pictures and Mirrors, Installing Kitchen Units, Loft Ladders, Laying Wooden Floors, Moving Furniture, Putting up Shelf’s, Rehanging Cupboard Doors, Replacing Sash Window Cords, Sash Window Repairs

Gardening

All Hedge work, Decking, Fencing and Decorative work, Graveling, Lawn Mowing, Leaf Collection, Maintenance, Path and Driveway Clearance, Planting, Weeding and Pruning, Pond Installation, Slabbing, Patios and Driveways, Tree Surgery, Turfing and Landscaping, Water Feature installation

Tiling

Bathroom Tiling, Cleaning Old and Discolored Grout, Fixing Shower Brackets, Floor Tiling, Kitchen Tiling, Living Room Tiling, Re-fitting Loose Tiles, Shower Room Tiling, Splashback Tiling, Steam Room Tiling, Wall Tiling, Wet Room Tiling

Plumbing

Bleeding Radiators, Changing Radiators, Fit Washing Machines and Dishwashers., Fitting Shower Screens, Fitting Toilet Seats, Fixing Leaking Taps and Pipes, Fixing Water Damage, Installing Dishwashers, Installing Garden Taps, Installing Washing machines, Plumbing in Kitchens and Baths, Plumbing in New Sinks, Toilets and Showers, Re-sealing Baths and Shower Trays, Repairing Toilet Flush and Cisterns, Replacing Ball Valves, Replacing Sinks and Basins, Replacing Taps and washers, Replacing Waste Disposal Units, Toilets Installation, Unblocking Sinks, Unblocking Urinals and Pipes

Project Name

Putting Up TVs, Hanging curtains, rails and blinds, Draught Proofing, Shower Screens, Fitting Door and Window Locks, Smoke Alarms, Carbon Monoxide Detectors, Child-proofing Sockets and Cupboards, Fitting Stair Gates, Replacing Sash Window Cords, Hanging Pictures and Mirrors, Fitting Curtain Poles and Rails, Flat-Pack Assembly, Lifting and Shifting Furniture, Boxing in and Drought Proofing, Changing Handles and Locks, Wall Mounting Plasma Screens, Fitting Blinds and Curtains, Fitting Signage
